website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad 100-14IBY is a solid desktop-replacement laptop with good battery life for a reasonable under-$500 price, but it doesn't shine otherwise. Better budget options are available.
pros: Long battery life in our tests

customer_reviews.text: For just over 300 bucks it was a good deal. 8gb ram and 500gb drive. So far nothing really to complain about after about a month of use.

customer_reviews.title: ... box was slightly damaged the inside Lenovo box was perfect started it up the thing ran slow and wifi ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one it was sold by computer upgrade king the Amazon box was slightly damaged the inside Lenovo box was perfect started it up the thing ran slow and wifi wouldn't stay connected so i shut it down and noticed the screen flickers when opening and shutting as if lose wire overall disappointed never had a problem with anything on Amazon sent back for refund
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow performance
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me this laptop is very slow and any photos she tries to process appear to be "grainy" and not clear. We got this for her for college (Graphic Arts major) but now it appears in stuck with this very unsatisfactory performing laptop, as it has only a 30 day policy. Stay away from this unit, it gets 2 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: AvA Jet

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased a refurbished one of this model. Except ...
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a refurbished one of this model. Except without the original package and probably some manuals missing, it is fully functional, clean, fast, and running quietly.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bill Li

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is garbage. Never buy computer thru Amazon again
customer_reviews.text: We are having to return to Lenovo for repair less than two weeks after purchase. It is garbage. Never buy computer thru Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ludolph

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound, ok design
customer_reviews.text: I simply wanted a laptop to use at home in bed and watch movies and similar things. My main concern was resolution and processing power. Sadly I didn't expect my main problem would be sound. The speakers in this computer are horrendous. It's probably the worst sound quality I've heard to date. Everything sounds tinny and underwater. I must have been spoiled by my previous laptops. I'm also have issues switching out my old laptop's SSD with this laptop's HDD. This is more of an advanced thing that most won't find useful, but it also adds to my frustration with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Polen

customer_reviews.title: good luck replacing it
customer_reviews.text: If your battery dies, good luck replacing it. Rather than a simple clip-in battery, the engineers behind this genius design decided it'd be a funny prank to make consumers take the laptop completely apart to switch the computer battery (which on average fails between 1-2 years). Didn't order from Amazon but would hate for anyone else to have to waste half an hour disassembling a laptop just to switch out the battery, something Dell and other brands make possible with 1 step clip-in batteries. Will not be purchasing a Lenovo again.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: CPU is too slow for the i3

product_meta.title: Ideapad 100-15IBD Laptop Intel i3-5020u 2.2GHz 8GB 500GB 15.6in W10
product_meta.description: Powerful Intel performance in an affordable laptop. The Lenovo Ideapad 100 offers incredible value for the money, but also delivers impressive processing power, a vivid HD display and easy portability. All the features you need in a stylish, yet affordable laptop.
feature_bullets: Intel 5th generation Core i3 5020U processor, 2.20 GHz;
15.6" LED backbit HD Screen, Integrated Intel HD Graphics 5500
WiFi 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth 4.0, Up to 4 hours battery life
1 USB 3.0, 1 USB 2.0, HDMI, 4 in 1 card reader Webcam, 1 x Headphone/Microphone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars22 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
